# FigmaForge Examples

## Generated Component

### TypeScript

```typescript
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core';
import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common';

/** ButtonComponent - Generated by FigmaForge */
@Component({
  selector: 'app-button',
  standalone: true,
  imports: [CommonModule],
  templateUrl: './button.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./button.component.scss']
})
export class ButtonComponent {
  // ==================== AUTO-GEN-START ====================
  @Input() label: string = '';
  @Input() iconUrl: string = '';
  // ==================== AUTO-GEN-END ====================
}
```

### HTML

```html
<!-- AUTO-GEN-START -->
<button class="button">
  <img [src]="iconUrl" alt="icon" class="button__icon" />
  <span class="button__text">{{ label }}</span>
</button>
<!-- AUTO-GEN-END -->
```

### SCSS

```scss
@import '../../styles/design-tokens';

.button {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background-color: $color-primary;
  border-radius: $radius-md;

  &__icon {
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
  }

  &__text {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: #FFFFFF;
  }
}
```

## Design Tokens

```scss
// design-tokens.scss - Generated by FigmaForge

$color-primary: #3B82F6;
$color-secondary: #10B981;
$font-family-inter: 'Inter', sans-serif;
$spacing-md: 16px;
$radius-md: 8px;
$shadow-md: 0px 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
```

## Non-Destructive Regeneration

Custom code outside AUTO-GEN blocks is preserved:

```typescript
export class ButtonComponent {
  // ==================== AUTO-GEN-START ====================
  @Input() label: string = '';
  // ==================== AUTO-GEN-END ====================

  // ✅ Your custom code - preserved on regeneration
  @Output() clicked = new EventEmitter<void>();
  
  onClick() {
    this.clicked.emit();
  }
}
```

## Best Practices

**Figma:**
- ✅ Use Auto-layout for containers
- ✅ Name layers descriptively (e.g., "Primary Button")
- ✅ Apply Styles for colors/typography

**Component names:**
- ✅ Use kebab-case: `primary-button`
- ❌ Avoid PascalCase: `PrimaryButton`
